sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Product } from '../models/product'; @Component({ selector: 'app-listproduct', templateUrl: './listproduct.component.html', styleUrls: ['./listproduct.component.css'] }) export class ListproductComponent { productsList: Product[]= [ {id: 1, title: "T-shirt 1", price: 18, quantity: 0, like: 0}, { id: 2, title: "T-shirt 2", price: 21, quantity: 10, like: 0 }, { id: 3, title: "T-shirt 3", price: 16, quantity: 8, like: 0 }, ] update(appart:any){ let i=this.productsList.findIndex(a=>a.id==appart.id) this.productsList[i]=appart } deleteprod(appart:any){ this.productsList=this.productsList.filter(app=>app!==appart) } addappart(appart:Product){ this.productsList.push(appart) } }
